body: Just look how many places needed to be changed because the signature changed here. Since this is mostly a legacy thing, how about we remove it from there, and do a hacky `tracing_state->create_handles = true;` in those few places that need it.
body_html: Just look how many places needed to be changed because the signature changed here. Since this is mostly a legacy thing, how about we remove it from there, and do a hacky tracing_state->create_handles = true; in those few places that need it.
